name: Motor Town: Behind the wheel (Alpha)
description:
Motor Town : Behind the wheel is an open world driving simulator with proper tire physics. We want players to enjoy realistic driving in a lively open world.

Behind the wheel

You start with a muscle car. 

You can just roam around and pick up some hitchhikers or go to warehouses and pick up deliveries to make some money. You can get trucks or pickups for free from warehouse if you want to.

There are car dealers where you can buy or rent cars.

You can replace your car parts at the tuning shop, such as transmission or final drive or even engine.

If you think you are ready, you can go for a race, time attack or autocross where you can compete with other players.

Features
  • Singleplayer and Multiplayer Mode
  • Open world (8 x 8 Km)
    • Passenger Transportation (Hitchhikers)
    • Cargo Transportation (Errand or Warehouse)
    • Refueling
    • Replacing car parts
    • Buying/Renting cars
    • Blinker, Headlight, Horn and Auto Pilot!
  • Race
    • 3 Race Tracks (Circuit, City, Offroad)
    • AI and Multiplayers
  • Timeattack
    • Online Leaderboard
    • 3 Race Tracks (Circuit, City, Offroad)
    • 1 Autocross
  • Driving with Keyboard, Mouse, Gamepad, Steering wheel
  • Realistic yet easy(with assist on) driving
Updates

There will be lots of updates.
Using itch.io App is highly recommended to keep game updated

**DISCLAIMER**

This game is still in the development stage.
We'd love to hear some feedback from you about this Alpha version, so we can give you much better game experience!
Join Discord if you want to drive through this journey with us!
